tool_description: Identifies major and minor astrological aspects from angular separations and calculates exact orbs and aspect strength.

angular_separation.description: Angular separation between planets in degrees (0-180)

orb_tolerance.description: Maximum orb for aspect recognition in degrees

include_minor_aspects.description: Whether to include minor aspects in analysis

aspect_strength_weights.description: Custom weights for different planets (10 values: Sun through Pluto)

error_messages: Invalid angular separation: Must be between 0 and 180 degrees
Invalid planet names: Use standard planet names (Sun, Moon, Mercury, etc.)
Invalid orb tolerance: Must be between 0.1 and 15 degrees
Invalid aspect weights: Array must contain exactly 10 positive numbers
No valid aspect found: Angular separation does not match any recognized aspect within orb tolerance
usage: Provide angular separation and planet names. Optionally configure orb tolerance, minor aspects inclusion, and custom planet weights. Returns identified aspects with strength ratings.

aspect_name.description: Name of the identified aspect (conjunction, opposition, etc.)

exact_orb.description: Exact orb from perfect aspect in degrees

is_exact.description: Whether aspect is within 1 degree of exactness
